name: Dice Puzzle
description: Dice Puzzle is a simple logic puzzle inspired by dice. Super easy to pick up, it's a great little distraction when you need to relax, but still want to use your brain. Very lightweight with short puzzles it's a great escape from the grind to keep on your desktop. Three difficulty modes let you scale game length to your liking. A great alternative to minesweeper for all you dice fans.
